channel.title: Lee McKinnon
channel.description: Engineer by trade, dad by joy, tinkerer by compulsion.

item.title: Hello...World?
item.dc:creator: Lee McKinnon
item.description: Starting this journey of sharing insights, findings, and cool stuff as I explore technology, leadership, and life.

item.title: Building a Modern Blog with Eleventy and TailwindCSS
item.dc:creator: Lee McKinnon
item.description: How I rebuilt my personal blog using Eleventy, TailwindCSS, and modern web development practices for a clean, fast, and maintainable site.

item.title: Hello World! Starting My Blog Journey
item.dc:creator: Lee McKinnon
item.description: After years of thinking about it, I'm finally starting my blog. Here's why I decided to take the plunge and what you can expect from this space.
